@description.name: @description
@description.body: This is an util class responsible for serializing qooxdoo objects.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Serializes the properties of the given qooxdoo object. To get the serialization working, every property needs to have a string representation because the value of the property will be concatenated to the serialized string.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
qxSerializer {Function?} Function used for serializing qooxdoo
   objects stored in the properties of the object. Check for the type of
   classes <ou want to serialize and return the serialized value. In all
   other cases, just return nothing.
@param.description:
Function used for serializing qooxdoo
   objects stored in the properties of the object. Check for the type of
   classes <ou want to serialize and return the serialized value. In all
   other cases, just return nothing.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
dateFormat {qx.util.format.DateFormat?} If a date formater is given,
   the format method of this given formater is used to convert date
   objects into strings.
@param.description:
If a date formater is given,
   the format method of this given formater is used to convert date
   objects into strings.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper method for {@link #toUriParameter}. Check for qooxdoo objects and returns the serialized name value pair for the given parameter.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The name of the value

@param.name: @param
@param.body: qxSerializer {Function?} The serializer for qooxdoo objects.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Serializes the properties of the given qooxdoo object into a native object.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
qxSerializer {Function?}
   Function used for serializing qooxdoo objects stored in the properties
   of the object. Check for the type of classes you want to serialize
   and return the serialized value. In all other cases, just return
   nothing.
@param.description:
Function used for serializing qooxdoo objects stored in the properties
   of the object. Check for the type of classes you want to serialize
   and return the serialized value. In all other cases, just return
   nothing.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
dateFormat {qx.util.format.DateFormat?} If a date formater is given,
   the format method of this given formater is used to convert date
   objects into strings.
@param.description:
If a date formater is given,
   the format method of this given formater is used to convert date
   objects into strings.

@return.name: @return
@return.description:
The serialized object. Depending on the input qooxdoo object, the returning
   type will vary.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Serializes the properties of the given qooxdoo object into a json object.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
qxSerializer {Function?} Function used for serializing qooxdoo
   objects stored in the properties of the object. Check for the type of
   classes <ou want to serialize and return the serialized value. In all
   other cases, just return nothing.
@param.description:
Function used for serializing qooxdoo
   objects stored in the properties of the object. Check for the type of
   classes <ou want to serialize and return the serialized value. In all
   other cases, just return nothing.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
dateFormat {qx.util.format.DateFormat?} If a date formater is given,
   the format method of this given formater is used to convert date
   objects into strings.
@param.description:
If a date formater is given,
   the format method of this given formater is used to convert date
   objects into strings.
